Package fi.tuni.prog3.sisu

Class SecondaryController

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.prog3.sisu.SecondaryController
public class SecondaryController extends Object
The controller for the second window. Creates the UI components.

  • Method Details

    • addDegreeInfo

      public void addDegreeInfo(UserData userData) throws MalformedURLException
      Adds student information to the window.
      Parameters:
      userData - Object containing the students information
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException - When the URL doesn't match anything

    • addTreeView

      public void addTreeView(javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane spCourses, javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane complCourses, String languageCode) throws MalformedURLException
      Adds the treeview to the scrollpane given via a parameter. Works by reading the degrees json structure and adds the proper parts to the proper treeitems. Also sets a mouse click -event to the treeitems.
      Parameters:
      spCourses - The scrollpane to be added to
      complCourses - The scrollpane into which the double-clicked courses are added to or removed from
      languageCode - The language with which the degree should be unpacked with
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException - When the URL doesn't match anything

    • recursiveUpdateCoursePane

      public void recursiveUpdateCoursePane(List<String> courses, javafx.scene.layout.VBox vbox, int idx, javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane complCourses)
      A recursive function with which to set the completed courses in a reverse order onto the vbox.
      Parameters:
      courses - A list of the students completed courses
      vbox - The vbox onto which the course labels are added
      idx - The index telling which element to add to the vbox

    • updateCoursePane

      public void updateCoursePane(javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane complCourses)
      Updates the window containing the completed courses.
      Parameters:
      complCourses - The scrollpane containing the completed courses

    • createUI

      public void createUI(UserData userData) throws MalformedURLException
      Builds the scrollpanes to the UI and calls for two functions: addTreeView to add the treeview of the courses on the left and updateCoursePane to add the completed courses to the right.
      Parameters:
      userData - Object containing the students information
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException - When the URL doesn't match anything
